data.eml:eml: A new species of Odontothrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) from Fars province Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hakimara, Mahsa, Minaei, Kambiz (2019): A new species of Odontothrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) from Fars province Iran. Zootaxa 4674 (1): 147-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.1.9
